subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Barcelona, playing without Lionel Messi, dropped its first home points of the season when they tied Villarreal, 1-1, opening the way for Real Madrid to take over first place in La Liga.
snippet: Barcelona, playing without Lionel Messi, dropped its first home points of the season when they tied Villarreal, 1-1, opening the way for Real Madrid to take over first place in La Liga.
